name: Poultry, Please
description:
I originally intended this to be a Papers, Please parody, about a (silly) dystopian future from a fast food restaurant. Of course, I ran out of time and so I'm left with a basic system without any story or audio. One room, in this case, was interpreted as being stuck working at the counter of a fast food restaurant.

Also, this is the first time I've used GameMaker - I got it from that Humble Bundle :)

No web export yet due to a GameMaker bug that hasn't been patched.
